name: PiratesoftheBlackSea
0:
”Alexa open pirates of the black sea”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pirates of the black sea
des: You’re the captain of a pirate ship in the Caribbean, seeking treasure, fame, and revenge against rival pirate lords. Engage in naval battles, raid coastal towns, and build a loyal crew. Navigate storms, evade the navy, and make tough decisions that determine your legacy. Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
